edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course

Class Course

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course.Activity
      • edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course.Course
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Conflict, java.lang.Comparable<Course>

    public class Course
extends Activity
implements java.lang.Comparable<Course>
    This class contains and maintains information related to Course type Activities, including name, title, section, credit value, instructor id, meeting dates, and meeting times
    Author:
    kmbrown

    • Constructor Detail

      • Course

        public Course(java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String title,
              java.lang.String section,
              int credits,
              java.lang.String instructorId,
              int enrollmentCap,
              java.lang.String meetingDays,
              int startTime,
              int endTime)
       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a course with the given name, title, section, credit value, instructor id, meeting days, start time, and end time
        Parameters:
        name - Course name, between 4 and 6 characters
        title - Course title
        section - Course section, 3 characters long
        credits - Course credit value, between 1 and 5 inclusive
        instructorId - Course instructor's unity id
        meetingDays - Course meeting days abbreviated to one character/day (M, T, W, H, F), only weekdays permissible
        startTime - Course start time in 24 hour clock format
        endTime - Course end time in 24 hour clock format
        enrollmentCap - the maximum enrollment in the Course
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • Course

        public Course(java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String title,
              java.lang.String section,
              int credits,
              java.lang.String instructorId,
              int enrollmentCap,
              java.lang.String meetingDays)
        Creates a Course with given name, title, section, credit value, instructor id, and meeting days Used when meeting days are Arranged and meeting times are absent.
        Parameters:
        name - Course name, between 4 and 6 characters
        title - Course title
        section - Course section, three characters long
        credits - Course credit value, between 1 and 5, inclusive
        instructorId - Course instructor's unity id
        meetingDays - Course meeting days, in abbreviated format, one character/day (M, T, W, H, F). Only weekdays permissible.
        enrollmentCap - the maximum enrollment in the Course

      • getMeetingDays

        public java.lang.String getMeetingDays()
        Returns the String containing the days that the Activity meets
        Specified by:
        getMeetingDays in class Activity
        Returns:
        String containing the meeting days of the Activity

      • setMeetingDays

        public void setMeetingDays(java.lang.String meetingDays)
        Sets the days that the Activity meets if the days to set are not null or an empty String. String is checked to ensure that it only contains abbreviations for weekday classes (M, T, W, H, F) or A for arranged. Presence of other characters will throw an exception. Also checks that the meeting days do not combine in an entry indicating an arranged class with other meeting days. Also rejects entries including multiple entries of the same meeting day, example MMM
        Parameters:
        meetingDays - String containing the meeting days of the Activity
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if days to be set are null, empty, contains an incorrect combination of characters, or contains invalid characters
